text: @piersmorgan Kensington High St will be full of Tory / English exceptionalists.Lockdown is not collapsing,it’s just that, as with Brexit, we have revealed ourselves to be anti facts+ anti science.10% of all deaths from COVID19 in the UK,imagine the anger of Tory press if this was a Corbyn Gov
